arm_group.description: consecutive COPD patients from outpatient clinics

brief_summary.textblock:
To detect the existence of severe obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) in chronic obstructive
      pulmonary disease (COPD) patients, which had higher mortality and hospitalization rate, a
      simplified questionnaire was developed for identifying those COPD patients with severe OSA.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Simplified Questionnaire to Detect OSA in COPD Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
To detect the existence of severe obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) in chronic obstructive
      pulmonary disease (COPD) patients, which had higher mortality and hospitalization rate, a
      simplified questionnaire was developed for identifying those COPD patients with severe OSA.

      With patient's BMI, neck and waist circumference, snores, witnessed apnea...

      Time frame suspect to enroll 5 patients in 1 month and complete 4 patients at least we need
      24 months to complete 120 patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  stable COPD patients

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  cancer exacerbation in recent 2 months pregnancy central type sleep apnea
             claustrophobia chronic respiratory failure
